column2: Installation program used by Fedora, RHEL, and others; uses POWER support for Continuous Integration and development

An Apache Foundation project for Infrastructure Engineers and Data Scientists looking for comprehensive packaging, testing, and configuration of the leading open source big data components; supports a wide range of components/projects, including, but not limited to, Hadoop, HBase and Spark
Supports POWER builds for CouchDB and possible other ASF projects in the future; currently working to support Cloudant on POWER
Apache Arrow is an in-memory columnar to exchange data among AI frameworks such as Apache Spark

An SSL/TLS library, with a focus on a clean, secure implementation of protocol, up-to-date with the latest research; POWER8 systems writes specific implementations of AES/GCM and other cryptographic algorithms that leverage the specific opcodes offered by the CPU, for better performance
Continuous intergration for IBM Blockchain hyperledger fabric code for POWER
PowerPC testing for Blosc, a high performance compressor optmized for binary data

Implements checkpoint-restore functionality for Linux on POWER architecture; functionality can be used for wide range of use-cases, including live migration, ‘suspend’ and ‘resume’ operations on containers, reboot-less kernel upgrades
Supports porting on POWER, continuous integration and builds integration
Supports project specific porting efforts of POWER8 ppc64/ppc64le
A universal operating system composed entirely of free software, and packaged by the Debian Project
Makes deep learning simple and accessible to enterprises. The project uses POWER VMs at OSL for compile builds, performance testing, architecture troubleshooting, including CUDA
Enrich the PowerPC container ecosystem by providing both a platform for developers to create docker containers, and for the PowerPC community to find docker images.

An open platform for developers and sysadmins to build, ship, and run distributed applications on laptops, data center VMs, or the cloud; provides build system to the Docker community to share Docker images built on this system; system is used on demand builds
Build an enterprise caliber technology foundation for language runtimes within cloud platforms.
Provides high performance Java Virtual Machine capabilities for the POWER platform
Part of the Elastic stack (Elasticsearch, Kibana, Logstash, Beats). Manual testing and checking that the Beats are working on POWER platform
Provides ppc64le build and performance testing for Elephant Shed, a bundle of PostgreSQL tools and web UI for easy administration of PostgreSQL servers
sidecar binary used by the most popular service mesh in the microservice space (istio)
an efficient lock-free queue for pipeline parallelism on multi-core architectures
Provide a location for developers to port their Fedora projects to the POWER architecture
Supports optimization of software scaling in FFmpeg running on POWER systems
Ports Mozilla Firefox to POWER8
Contributes to improved support of GCC and Clang projects on POWER machines by working on IBM Linux Technology Center items on bountysource.com
"Compiler optimizations and bug fixing for POWER port of GCC fortran compiler"
Part of Gentoo Linux and is responsible for porting Gentoo to PowerPC architecture of all flavors
state-of-the-art open source compiler and interactive environment for the functional language Haskell
ISDB middleware for interactive DTV. Supports project in porting to POWER8
The GNU C Library project provides the core libraries for the GNU system and GNU/Linux systems
Supports project specific porting efforts of POWER8 ppc64/ppc64le
An open source platform powered by Meteor uses the POWER infrastructure to test deployments on POWER8.

CI environment powered by a Jenkins server running Hadoop and Spark builds for including POWER into the Hyperledger fabric community to perform Continuous Integration for IBM Hyperledger fabric codebase.
A secure, enterprise-ready open source Apache Hadoop distribution based on a centralized architecture (YARN) now on POWER
Supports compiling and testing Istio, a platform for microservice management, on POWER
A fast multi-threaded k-mer counter. POWER infrastructure is being used to compile builds, performance testing, architecture troubleshooting
Adds ppc64el support to appliance image for building/interfacing with juju, the juju charm store, and assembling charms
ppc64el port of the Julia language to LLVM-6.0
Provides docker image of jupyter/base-notebook on POWER
The Numerical Linear Algebra package project tests builds on IBM architecture and with IBM compiler and also uses it to fix bugs with IBM xlf
Supports project specific porting efforts for the the LLVM-based D compiler
Supports project specific porting efforts of POWER8 ppc64/ppc64le
a library for applications looking to use the Container Pod concept, popularized by Kubernetes
Adds VSX optimizations for libvpx on POWER architecture
Allows maintainer of Linux kernel features to test on ppc64le
Tests for and maintains compatibility between Linux distributions

Supports project specific porting efforts of POWER8 ppc64/ppc64le to run buildbot instances; these instances build LLVM and run the test suites when patches are checked in to ensure they run properly on the POWER architecture
Supports project specific porting efforts of POWER8 ppc64/ppc64le
Enable and optimize frameworks of OpenBLAS, NVIDIA/Caffe, BVLC/Caffe, Torch, TensorFlow, Theano, DIGITS for IBM POWER Platform
API’s for resource management and scheduling across entire datacenter and cloud environments. OSL hosts the CI infrastructure on POWER platform for this project
Carefully measure the performance of the bandwidth between different system compenents on POWER systems to understand their influence on application development
Supports Mozilla projects in testing builds, running automated functionality tests, and debugging architecture-specific bugs.
Contributes towards FOSS software, optimizations for POWER arch; specifically contributes towards HHVM JIT, LLVM and other FOSS projects on POWER8
Supports project specific porting efforts of POWER8 ppc64/ppc64le; provides stable POWER releases for community builds of Node.js
Numerical computing in Python, now on POWER
Uses images agnostics of the NVIDIA driver to make Docker images portable while still leveraging NVIDIA GPUs
A modern, functional programming language with support for fast native code compilation on POWER

Observationally Cooperative Multithreading: provides a 'kinder gentler' form of concurrency, allowing programmers to imagine that a single thread runs on the machine at any one time; uses POWER8 hardware transactional memory to run multiple threads at the same time while appearing to be running only one at a time
Open Neural Network Exchange, ONNX provides an open source format for AI models, both deep learning and traditional ML
Optimizes BLAS 1/2 double precision for POWER8 VSX
Implements POWER8 and POWER9 VSX SIMD optimizations for OpenCV
Supports project specific porting efforts of POWER8 ppc64/ppc64le; provides support for Java 7 and 8 which is being consumed by most major distributions
PowerPC support for OpenLibm, a high quality, portable, standalone C mathematical library

An Open Source Engine for seismic hazard and risk assessment uses the infrastructure to try porting to POWER architecture and see how a different architecture affects the numerical tests (the code is covered by numerical, functional and qa tests)
Supports building ppc64le Docker images for OpenWhisk, a programming service that provides event based execution of functions
Multi-Model NoSQL database management system that supports graph, document, key/value and object models. Uses PowerCI infrastructure for regression tests
Provides education on parallel programming, and availability of a ppc64le system will help ensure that this education is not x86-centric.
Provides ppc64le builds for pgSphere, a PostgreSQL extension for spherical geometry
Allows the postgres database system to build and troubleshoot on pp64le architecture on various distributions.
Supports development and compiling efforts for Debian on PowerPC. The goal is to design an Open Hardware notebook motherboard based on the Power Architecture NXP T2080 CPU
Supports efforts of a POWER8 ppc64le port of Presto, a distributed SQL query engine for running interactive analytic queries against big data sources
Supports efficient trimming of primer sequences from next-generation sequencing reads sequenced from libraries which use PCR to amplify the target DNA
A library of useful vector functions for POWER
Python framework for tensors and deep neural networks. Uses POWER8 for continuous integration and functional testing
Python tools for running quantum information experiments
Building the fastest key/value database, PPC port for CI and testing
A community driven third party repository for Fedora and Enterprise Linux. They use a dedicated VM as a builder connected to their main infrastructure for building packages for ppc64le platform
Ensures support and viability of Secure Hash Algorithm 3 on POWER, including POWER8 specific optimizations

An open source tool which provides CI testing for open-source projects which use a traditional patches + email system for accepting contributions; improves the state of continuous integration for a number of open source projects which are critical to the OpenPOWER community, providing automated test capabilities, similar to work already being done on the x86 architecture
"Fast and highly comprehensible programming language for Unix-based operating systems. Supports objects-oriented
"Offers a POWER8 testing platform for Google's optical character recognition library
Supports a volunteer developer's efforts to test the Linux kernel on POWER
Continuous Integration using Travis and Power
Provides access to the POWER8 architeture for Travis, Rust, or Swift project developers
Updates the Altivec code in x264 and x265 to VSX and makes sure it works correctly on POWER8le
SIMD Optimization Bountys
Dedicated to developing a high-quality, open video format for the web that's freely available to everyone
Explores POWER8-specific optimizations for x265 including, but not restricted to, assembly optimizations and thread-related optimizations

A Remote Desktop and Remote Application Solution. Originally developed on x86/x64 hardware platforms, the server and client components are also available for ARM (Raspbian) and POWER (big and little endian). In short, it's for Linux what Citrix is for Windows.
Supports project specific porting efforts of POWER8 ppc64/ppc64le
